entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Milk River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Milk River 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -18.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
